## LegacyHandlerPluginOptions

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/legacy/src/plugin.ts" sourceLine="25" packageName="@commandkit/legacy" />

Options for the LegacyHandlerPlugin.

```ts title="Signature"
interface LegacyHandlerPluginOptions {
    commandsPath: string;
    eventsPath: string;
    validationsPath: string;
    skipBuiltInValidations: boolean;
    devUserIds: string[];
    devGuildIds: string[];
    devRoleIds: string[];
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### commandsPath

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The path to the commands directory.
Relative to the current working directory.
### eventsPath

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The path to the events directory.
Relative to the current working directory.
### validationsPath

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The path to the validations directory.
Relative to the current working directory.
### skipBuiltInValidations

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`boolean`}   />

Whether to skip built-in validations.
Defaults to false.
### devUserIds

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string[]`}   />

List of user IDs that are considered developers.
Used for dev-only commands and validations.
### devGuildIds

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string[]`}   />

List of guild IDs that are considered development guilds.
Used for dev-only commands and validations.
### devRoleIds

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string[]`}   />

List of role IDs that are considered developer roles.
Used for dev-only commands and validations.
